articles.description: Manchester United are interested in appointing Sporting boss Ruben Amorim as their new manager and are willing to pay his 10m euros (£8.3m) release clause, the Portuguese club say.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd interested in Sporting manager, say Portuguese club

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from the friendly between England and South Africa.
articles.title: England vs South Africa LIVE: Follow radio and text commentary as Lionesses return to action

articles.description: Commentators, journalists and politicians in Brazil criticise the decision to award the Ballon d'Or to Manchester City's Rodri rather than Vinicius Junior of Real Madrid.
articles.title: Vinicius Junior: Brazil reacts to the 'injustice' of Real Madrid forward missing out on Ballon d'Or to Man City's Rodri

articles.description: Watch BBC Scotland coverage, listen on BBC Radio Scotland and follow live text commentary as Scotland host Hungary in Euro 2025 qualifying.
articles.title: Scotland vs Hungary: Uefa Women's Championship Qualification - BBC Sport

articles.description: Have Ineos failed their first big test in charge of Manchester United with their delayed decision to sack Erik ten Hag?
articles.title: Erik ten Hag sacked by Man Utd: Questions for Ineos after sticking with Dutchman in summer

articles.description: Centre Henry Slade will resume his starting role in England's midfield against New Zealand on Saturday despite playing only 54 minutes of club rugby this season.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Henry Slade and Ben Spencer to start

articles.description: Watch, listen and follow live text commentary from Cardiff as Wales seek to overturn a 2-1 first-leg deficit against Slovakia in their Euro 2025 qualifying round one play-off tie.
articles.title: Wales vs Slovakia: Watch, listen and text in crucial Euro 2025 play-off

articles.description: Watch live video and text commentary as Northern Ireland host Croatia, plus text updates as Republic of Ireland face Georgia in the second round of the Euro 2025 play-offs.
articles.title: Euro 2025 play-offs: Northern Ireland vs Croatia and Republic of Ireland vs Georgia

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper cruises through to the second round of the Paris Masters with a straight-set win over the Czech Republic's Jiri Lehecka.
articles.title: Paris Masters: Britain's Jack Draper beats Jiri Lehecka to reach second round

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Spain midfielder Rodri "deserved" to win the 2024 Ballon d'Or.
articles.title: Rodri 'deserved' 2024 Ballon d'Or win, says Man City boss Pep Guardiola
